formalText: He's been fairly anxious this week about a few different things.
He's been working on the same paper for the last couple months.
It's sort of been his big paper that he wants to talk about and have job interviews.
So he finished that paper Sunday, which is a good thing, but it's sort of anxiety attached to will he ever finish this just to get it done already.

To the job portion, he feels like he has to find the right job on one level so that his wife doesn't kill herself, and he's on another level, but he's happy somewhere for the next couple years, and on another level so that he picks the right ones so that he has a career that he wants.
Another thing he's been anxious about is sort of where he left things last week.
There's been less pressing in the last several days, and he's been pretty much more anxious about other things.
Certain things have been on his mind also.
